description: Generate confirmation prompts with Yes/Cancel options adapted to the channel

optional_params.name: additional_context
optional_params.description: Extra information to show (e.g., preview, current status)

response_format.interaction_id: unique ID to track user's response

error_codes.SEND_FAILED: Couldn't send confirmation. Please try again.

usage_notes: Slack: Use Block Kit buttons for interactive confirmation
Email: Use mailto links or web links to confirmation endpoints
Destructive actions (delete, unpublish) should use warning_level='danger'
Message should clearly state what will happen
Include article title explicitly in message (not just 'it')
Show relevant context: current status, preview, etc.
Track interaction_id to match responses to original requests

examples.create: I'll create a new article titled '[TITLE]' as a draft. Is this correct?
examples.update: I'll update '[ARTICLE_TITLE]' so the [field] is '[new value]'. Is this correct?
examples.delete: ⚠️ I'll permanently delete '[ARTICLE_TITLE]'. This can't be undone. Are you sure?
examples.publish: I'll publish '[ARTICLE_TITLE]' and make it live on the website. Is this correct?
examples.unpublish: I'll unpublish '[ARTICLE_TITLE]' and remove it from the website. Is this correct?
